=Installation=

*Note that if you are using an svn checkout of Django, replacing the directories will break future svn updates. Therefore, we suggest using the latest official release (which is 1.0.2).*

  # *Download Grappelli*
    Install Grappelli anywhere on your python-path.
{{{
svn checkout http://django-grappelli.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ grappelli
}}}
  # *Add Grappelli to your INSTALLED APPS*
    Open your projects settings-file (settings.py) and add Grappelli to your INSTALLED APPS.
{{{
INSTALLED_APPS = (
    ...
    'grappelli',
)
}}}
  # *Sync your Database*
    Run the Django 'syncdb' command to create the appropriate tables.
{{{
python manage.py syncdb
}}}
  # *Optional: Load Fixtures for Navigation*
    ItÂ´s recommended to load some initial data for the Sidebar Navigation.
{{{
python manage.py loaddata grappelli_navigation.json --settings=settings
}}}
  # *Copy media*
    Copy the folder /media/ to your admin media-directory. Alternatively, you might want to use a symlink.
{{{
cp -R /path/to/grappelli/media /path/to/your/admin/media
}}}
  # *Copy Templates*
    Copy the folder /template/ to your admin templates-directory. Alternatively, you might want to use a symlink.
{{{
cp -R /path/to/grappelli/templates /path/to/your/admin/templates
}}}
